attributes.name: initialize

attributes.documentation: @dev The base contract for the RandomAuRa and RandomHBBFT contracts.
attributes.name: RandomBase

attributes.documentation: @dev Ensures the `initialize` function was called before.
attributes.name: onlyInitialized

attributes.documentation:
@dev Ensures the caller is the ValidatorSet contract address
 (EternalStorageProxy proxy contract for ValidatorSet).
attributes.name: onlyValidatorSetContract

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns the current random seed accumulated during RANDAO or another process (depending on
 implementation). This getter can only be called by the `ValidatorSet` contract.
attributes.name: getCurrentSeed

attributes.documentation: @dev Returns a boolean flag indicating if the `initialize` function has been called.
attributes.name: isInitialized

attributes.documentation: @dev Returns the address of the `ValidatorSet` contract.
attributes.name: validatorSetContract

attributes.documentation:
@dev Initializes the network parameters. Used by the `initialize` function of a child contract.
 @param _validatorSet The address of the `ValidatorSet` contract.
attributes.name: _initialize

attributes.documentation:
@dev Updates the current random seed.
 @param _seed A new random seed.
attributes.name: _setCurrentSeed

attributes.documentation: @dev Reads the current random seed from the state.
attributes.name: _getCurrentSeed

attributes.documentation:
@dev This contract holds all the necessary state variables to carry out the storage of any upgradable contract
 and to support the upgrade functionality.
attributes.name: EternalStorage

attributes.documentation:
@dev Provides access control functionality and extends the `EternalStorage` contract.
 Using the `onlyOwner` modifier, a function can be restricted so that it can only be 
 called by the owner of the contract. The owner of a contract can irrevocably transfer 
 ownership using the `EternalStorageProxy.transferOwnership` function.
attributes.name: OwnedEternalStorage

attributes.documentation: @dev Access check: revert unless `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath
